text: Jeong Rae-hyuk (; 17 January 1926 – 17 May 2022) was a South Korean military officer and politician. He was Minister of Commerce and Industry from 1961 to 1962 and Minister of National Defense from 1970 to 1971. He was also a member of the National Assembly from 1973 to 1985. Jeong was born in Gokseong County, Chōsen. Jeong died in Seoul, South Korea on 17 May 2022 at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2022 deaths Category:South Korean military people Category:South Korean politicians
title: Jeong Rae-hyuk
